name: Jade the psychopath
description:
(this game has lots of drug use, tobacco and alcohol use, and TONS of swears! so basically its not for kids!)

     You play as Jade psychopath, who's landed in a strange world, but luckily she's not alone! She has her trusty knife and her best friend, Taki the mask! He's a sentient mask who's absolutely loveable, He's also a huge asshole! Along with these two joins a strange cat like entity who's on a quest to protect their world, by protecting Jade! Because without her the entire timeline is destine to be destroyed! join these three on their journey through this strange land, they'll make lots'a friends and even more enemies!



Made by KiTTiE-K@T! (Thats me!)
